title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 607.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 607.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Project shall
mean the construction of flood prevention works in one specific
watershed. (b) Lands (easements and
rights-of-way) shall mean the physical lands only, which have been or will be
acquired in fee title or less than fee title for the purpose of the
project. (c) Easements and
rights-of-way shall mean any right of user on the land, whether legal or
equitable, necessary for the purpose of the project. (d) Commissioner shall mean the Commissioner
of Environmental Conservation. (e) Authorized expenditures shall mean those expenditures determined by the
commissioner to be reasonable and necessary as provided in section
299-w
of the

County Law. (f) Construction season
shall mean the period from spring through fall in any one calendar year when
climatic conditions are not so severe as to prohibit construction. (g) Fiscal period shall mean from April 1st
of one year to March 31st of the following year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
607.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
